Description: Tool for merging paired-end Illumina reads and trimming adapters.
EDAM_topic: Genomics, Sequence assembly, Sequencing, Probes and primers
EDAM_topic_(no_superclasses): Genomics, Sequence assembly, Sequencing, Probes and primers
bio.tool_description: Strips adapters and optionally merges overlapping paired-end (or paired-end contamination in mate-pair libraries) illumina style reads.
